mapper.insert: insert into KRschjob(SCHJBID, SCHID, POSID, HALLNUM) values(KRschjob_seq.nextVal,#{schId},#{posId},#{hallNum})
mapper.select: select j.SCHJBID, j.SCHID, j.POSID, j.HALLNUM, j.JBSKID, s.JBSKNAME from KRschjob j, krjobseeker s where SCHID = #{schId} And j.jbskid = s.JBSKID(+)
mapper.update: update KRschjob set JBSKID = #{jbskId} where SCHJBID = #{schjbId}
update KRschjob set JBSKID = NULL where SCHJBID = #{schjbId}
